scripts.build-local: npm run delete-local && react-scripts --max_old_space_size=4096 build && npm run bundle-sw-dependencies-local && sw-precache --config=sw-precache-config-local.js && npm run rename-local
scripts.build: react-scripts --max_old_space_size=4096 build && npm run bundle-sw-dependencies && npm run minify && sw-precache --config=sw-precache-config.js
scripts.delete-local: node -e "require('fs-extra').remove('d-chat', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Successfully deleted!') })"
scripts.rename-local: node -e "require('fs').rename('build', 'd-chat', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.minify: terser build/service-worker-ipfs.js --output build/service-worker-ipfs.min.js && npm run cleanup
